name: Organisation of European Businesses in Nigeria LTD/GTE
goal: To actively promote trade, investments and exchanges between the European and Nigerian business, advocating European quality standards, best practices and corporate social responsibility
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Advocacy on the benefits of the Economic Partnership Agreement between the EU and West Africa, that Nigeria has not yet signed

- Advocacy on the benefits of open economies, open trade

- Supporting European companies to trade and invest in Nigeria
